title: Renaming the name of this forum
content:
my idea is in the forum i am posting in "The Classics" why not rename it to a different name cos people post topic about new games when this is surpossed to be a forum to post about the classics, renaming the name of this forum to something like "Gaming" will make sense when people post about new & old games

i hope the staff will consider thisRorie

[img]http://venus.walagata.com/w/thedosvault/sig/bush.jpg[/img]
ANTI-BUSH
